articles.author: Cady Stanton, USA TODAY
articles.title: Bahamas Sandals resort deaths: Americans had sought medical treatment - USA TODAY
articles.description: Bahamas officials on Monday identified the two couples from Tennessee and Florida who fell ill last week at a resort, resulting in three deaths.
articles.content:
The three Americans who fell ill and died while at a Sandals resort in the Bahamas had  been treated for symptoms at a hospital the night before, Bahamas police said Monday.
Paul Rolle, Commissioner… [+4090 chars]
